examples.sentence: The arc furnace requires 35 kA current to melt scrap metal.
Lightning strikes can reach 200 kA for microseconds.
The electrician checked the kA meter with special gloves.
The last German kaiser fled to the Netherlands in 1918.
Kaiser Wilhelm II's mustache became a popular meme template.
This burger uses a crispy Kaiser roll as its bun.
Her smoothie contains kale, banana and dragon fruit.
The curly edges of kale make it look like a vegetable ballerina.
Farmers market vendors stack kale like emerald towers.
Kale chips are the hipster version of potato chips.
The secret to tasty kale salad is massaging the leaves with olive oil.
Dinosaur kale got its name because its texture resembles reptile skin.
The child gasped as the kaleidoscope revealed a new galaxy of colors.
Her fashion style is like a human kaleidoscope with bold patterns.
The night market offers a kaleidoscope of street food.
The kaleidoscopic lights at Shanghai Bund make tourists dizzy.
Her dress shows a kaleidoscopic pattern of Sichuan opera masks.
The kaleidoscopic stock market confuses new investors.
TikTok offers kaleidoscopic content from dog dancing to rocket science.
The high-speed train provides kaleidoscopic views of rural China.
Elon Musk's kaleidoscopic mind jumps from electric cars to brain chips.
Bananas are rich in kali which prevents muscle cramps.
Doctors may prescribe kali supplements for patients with low blood pressure.
The kamikaze pilot tied a hachimaki headband before his final mission.
Some kamikaze letters were found inside folded paper cranes.
The kamikaze unit caused heavy losses to Allied ships near Okinawa.
Modern drones are sometimes called 'AI kamikaze' in military reports.
The terrorist's kamikaze attack shocked the whole world.
That startup went kamikaze by burning all funding in 3 months.
A kangaroo mother carries her joey in the pouch like a living baby carrier.
Tourists in Australia often mistake wallabies for baby kangaroos.
The internet mob set up a kangaroo court to judge the celebrity.

examples.sentence: The Kantian perspective on morality emphasizes categorical imperatives.
Her thesis examines Kantian aesthetics in contemporary art.
This Kantian approach to epistemology revolutionized Western thought.
The debate centered around Kantian versus utilitarian ethics.
As a dedicated Kantian, he could recite the Critique of Pure Reason by heart.
The conference brought together Kantians from 15 countries.
The lightning strike carried a current of 30 ka.
Industrial electrolysis often requires currents in the ka range.
The delicate teacup was made from pure kaolin imported from Jiangxi.
Artisans mix kaolin with water to create porcelain slurry.
Kaolin deposits turn the hillsides ghostly white in Fujian province.
The cosmetic mask contains refined kaolin for oil absorption.
Pottery beginners often start with kaolin clay for its smooth texture.

examples.sentence: After forgetting his girlfriend's birthday, his relationship was totally kaput.
My diet plan went kaput when I saw the hotpot buffet.
The startup went kaput after burning through all investments in 3 months.
His NBA dreams were kaput after the knee injury.
My phone is kaput after falling into the spicy soup.
The elevator went kaput during rush hour - classic!
Flip phones are completely kaput in the smartphone era.
That meme template is so kaput even boomers won't use it.
The air conditioner always goes kaput on the hottest day.
Our WiFi went kaput right before the online exam.
We rented a karaoke room and sang Jay Chou's songs all night.
Japanese salarymen love drinking beer while doing karaoke.
This karaoke version removes the original vocals completely.
She made a karaoke track using GarageBand for her mom's birthday.
The 1990s karaoke machine with disco lights is now vintage.
Taipei's karaoke bars stay open until 5am.
Bruce Lee combined karate with other martial arts to create Jeet Kune Do.
Kids in Tokyo do karate drills while shouting 'osu!' like little warriors.
He pretended to deliver a karate chop to break the watermelon.
Her white karate gi got stained with grass during outdoor training.
When the scammer got scammed himself, everyone said it was karma.
Karma bit him back after he kicked stray puppies.
Their reunion after 20 years felt like karma at work.
Some believe weibo karma determines viral trends.
His instant karma came when his cheating video went viral.
The shopping mall installed electric karts shaped like pandas for kids.
Mario Kart video game makes everyone dream of driving rainbow-colored karts.
The billionaire built a private go-kart track in his basement.
During team building, we crashed go-karts like bumper cars.

examples.sentence: Kashmiri shares similarities with both Hindi and Persian.
The poet wrote verses in Kashmiri to preserve local culture.
Many Kashmiris are multilingual due to the region's complex history.
Traditional Kashmiri weddings feature vibrant phiran costumes.
Kashmiri cuisine is famous for its fragrant saffron-infused dishes.
The intricate embroidery on this Kashmiri shawl took six months to complete.
The Inuit hunter silently approached the seal in his traditional kayak.
Modern kayaks at outdoor clubs often use colorful plastic materials.
We crossed the fjord in a bright yellow sea kayak.

examples.sentence: Midnight kebab stands are the lifeline for drunk Brits after pubs close.
The street vendor skillfully rotated lamb kebabs over charcoal flames.
Doner kebab with extra chili sauce is the ultimate hangover cure.
The archaeologists found a Viking ship's keel preserved in the ice.
Like the keel of a ship, your backbone keeps you upright.
We crossed the lake in a traditional keel.
The keel is ideal for shallow waters due to its flat bottom.
The shipwright keeled the hull before adding the ribs.
They keeled the fishing boat to make it more stable.
The overloaded canoe keeled over in the strong current.
When the whale surfaced, our small boat nearly keeled.
After running the marathon, he keeled over from exhaustion.
Meditation helps keep my emotions on an even keel.

examples.sentence: The chef's keen knife sliced through the Peking duck like butter.
Be careful with that keen razor blade!
With her keen eye, she spotted the typo in the contract immediately.
The detective's keen observation solved the mystery in minutes.
There's a keen competition for the last mooncake in the office.
He felt a keen disappointment when his WeChat red packet was only 0.01 yuan.
The delivery guy showed keen reflexes dodging pedestrians.
Her keen movements won her the mobile game championship.
He's always keen to help newcomers with their first hotpot experience.
The teacher was keen on making calligraphy fun for kids.
Fresh graduates are keen to join tech giants like Tencent.
She's keen for a taste of authentic Sichuan cuisine.
The Irish band played a traditional keen at the funeral.
Ancient Chinese keen was often accompanied by the guqin.
The village women raised a loud keen for the deceased.
Her keen could be heard throughout the hospital corridor.
The mourners keened throughout the night vigil.
In some cultures, professional mourners are hired to keen.
She keened over her broken smartphone screen.
The whole family keened when their pet panda escaped.
Gen Z is especially keen on blind box collections.
My grandma is surprisingly keen on TikTok dances.
The intern is as keen as mustard to learn about AI.
He was as keen as mustard to try stinky tofu for the first time.

examples.sentence: The chef's knife cut keenly through the frozen dumpling.
Her gaze was keenly observing the AI-generated painting.
Pandas don't react keenly to zookeepers' calls - they prefer bamboo.
The e-sports player moved his fingers keenly across the mechanical keyboard.
Netizens debated keenly about the new emoji designs.
Two food delivery drivers were competing keenly outside the hotpot restaurant.
Generation Z feels keenly about work-life balance.
The keenness of the samurai sword could split a falling cherry blossom.
Diamond cutters rely on the keenness of their blades to shape gems.
The keenness of her critique made the author revise the draft three times.
Stand-up comedians often use the keenness of satire to reflect social issues.
A psychologist's keenness to emotional changes helps in counseling.
His keenness to market trends earned him the nickname 'Human Radar'.
Fishing is the main keep for the coastal villagers.
She earns her keep by teaching English online.
The keep of this ancient temple costs millions annually.
The keep of his luxury lifestyle drains his savings.
The keep of peace in this region is challenging.
Good keep of health requires regular exercise.
Keep calm when facing difficulties.
We should keep social distancing during the pandemic.
Keep your important documents in a safe place.
This method can keep food fresh for a longer time.
All citizens should keep the law.
He always keeps his promises.
The shepherd keeps the sheep from wolves.
Security guards keep the building safe at night.
She keeps her room neat and tidy.
The librarian keeps the books in perfect order.
It's hard to keep a long-distance relationship.
The government keeps the price of basic goods stable.
He keeps his duties as a father responsibly.
The company keeps its commitment to environmental protection.
They keep a small grocery store in the neighborhood.
My aunt keeps a bed and breakfast in the countryside.
The police kept the suspect for questioning.
He was kept in custody for three days.
The accountant keeps the company's financial records.
She keeps a detailed account of her daily expenses.
The weather keeps fine these days.
Keep quiet during the meeting.
The rain kept falling all night.
He kept talking about his trip to Tibet.
It's hard to keep up with the latest fashion trends.
She jogs every day to keep up with her fitness.
Keep in mind that safety comes first.
You should keep your parents' advice in mind.
